address: Avinguda de la Generalitat, 1, 25560 Sort, Lleida
name: Rafting Catalunya
description: Share with family or friends the adventure of Rafting in the rough waters of the Noguera Pallaresa River. You will descend a whitewater river in an inflatable raft accompanied by expert guides with great experience and professionalism. Your safety will come first. And your enjoyment too

reviews.text: As a small group of 3 people we were teamed up with another 2 and had an amazing time, lead by Alfonso in Inferno Canyon. He is an extremely professional guide and I felt secure following his advice. The canyon was great for beginners with a decent level of physical fitness and willingness to overcome some fears. I would totally repeat barranquismo in another canyon there.

As Blu Selection, we had an amazing team building event with Rafting Catalunya. We felt really safe and most importantly, had a lot of fun.

They first gave us every single detail regarding security and as we felt more expert, the level of entertainment went up higher. The nature surrounding is amazing and since we had ours in early July water was not cold but really refreshing.

Big thanks to our lovely guide, Miguel, for his clear instructions and making rafting even more entertaining than it already is.

Had a really fun time rafting with rafting Catalunya. The tour guide was fun and stopped us so we could jump of cliffs, swim and float in the river. We also got to see land marks and stop in small caves. When you go with this company you get nice surprises üëå and very nice tour guides.
Amazing rafting company, I didn‚Äôt except to have so much fan, Edu is a cool guide, we enjoyed a lot üòä
Professional, entertaining and friendly staff. Fantastic experience all round!! English speaking

name: Rafting Darnius
description: After several years of experience in the adventure tourism sector, the members of our team decided to get together and offer the market a more personal and professional service: our visitors would enjoy the activity as much as we do ourselves. For this we have qualified guides, passionate about their work and with their feet on the ground. We provide the security you are looking for on your adventures, with approved and appropriate equipment for each type of activity, thus offering you a quality and trustworthy service.

reviews.text: Amazing experience. We had a real blast. Great people: our guide, Jorge, kind and fun. Fernando, the photographer, and Juli√°n, guiding the other raft. Thanks for this, guys.
Good team. Perfect place. Try it
We had a blast! Perfect for kids, instructors are nice, friendly!
Very fun thing to do. Really recommend it!!
The rafting was a lot of fun. Never done before, but worth repeating. The guides are great! They even master a few words of Dutch.

name: Rafting Llavors√≠
description: We are a team dedicated entirely to adventure sports and outdoor activities. Our goal is to teach you everything we know and make every moment you spend with us unforgettable.

reviews.text: Rafting was really fun! First time I did it but the experience and the staff was nice! Definitely recommend!!

Amazing experience and lots of fun! We came in the last day of the season, right before winter, so there wasn't too much water, but it's been said that in the spring the level of the water is much higher, reaching about 2 meters. Marc, our instructor, was real nice and super friendly and gave us a great time!
You get water suits and boots to change to in the toilet/showers/changing room before going on the rafts, so you don't need anything besides swimsuits. It's possible to leave your stuff at the site. You'll be driven back to the starting point by a minibus.

Amazing rafting experience! All was super fun!!! The instructor we had was very funny and friendly.
Will definitely come back!

Our guide was great and the experience was fun but with any action sport, safety should be a number one concern. Our boat had a puncture in the main bottom section, which meant we completely flooded as soon as we hit the white water, making it impossible to steer and badly hurt my back on underwater rocks we should have floated over.

Half way down the boat was pumped up and emptied of water, but I felt we should have been taken back and offered the option of a refund or restart with a working boat, as the same thing happened again in the second section of rapids.

Quality equipment should be a given for these sports considering the amount they cost and the experience would have been great if it wasn‚Äôt for this.
Good guides, this was the first time for us and our children, and the experience was very good. Long enough to start.

address: Carrer Major s/n, Edifici Agulla de les Ares, Local 4 25580, Esterri d√Äneu, Lleida
name: Alta Ruta Aventura
description: Alta Ruta AventuraS.L. is a company dedicated to the organization and realization of adventure activities for all ages, tastes and physical conditions. With more than 27 years of history, we put at your disposal all our knowledge and experience to make your adventure an unforgettable memory.

reviews.text: A great canyoning excursion.

It was our first experience of canyoning. We decided to start with the Barranc de l'infern.
It was a very fun experience, adaptable to everyone and the great guides, very professional and friendly, make you feel safe and at home.
I recommend it 100% to anyone who wants to spend a few hours to disconnect and be in contact with nature.

Eager to do the next ravine with them. We will repeat.

Excellent! Recommendable. We did family and perfect canyoning. We had a gauging problem and it was fixed for us in no time.
The guide pepelu, professional and very nice.
We will repeat
All perfect. They coordinated different activities for us and everything was great. Gemma treated us very well, sympathy and professionalism. Thank you.
The treatment of the 10 monitors, everything perfect, the office girls great. Highly recommended

name: Aventura Girona
description: At Aventura Girona we are backed by more than 10 years of experience in adventure activities applied to reinforcing the bond between co-workers, with the aim of seeking escape, fun and sociability away from the everyday environment.

reviews.text: We had a wonderful day with the team from Aventura Girona.  They met us outside our campsite and took 11 of us on a really fun afternoon.  We were aged from 12 - old and all of us had fun.  They knew the river well so could tell us where we could jump off high rocks, go down slides and under waterfalls.  They were so friendly and fun but safety conscious at the same time.  Highly recommend these guys.  Oh and the wetsuits they give you are high quality so kept us warm in a cold river!!

Such a nice trip. Great guides, so much fun for kids (we had 5 kids from 12 -15 and all loved it), and the adults had a great day too. Perfect blend of safety and excitement. Good quality wet-suits were also welcome as the water is chilly, but with wet-suits on no one got cold. And, the river is so, so beautiful. Would love to do it again soon!

We had a lot of fun and excitements. I think canyoning is one of coolest things to do in the hot summer. Carlos and his team took a good care of us. We‚Äôd love to do the next level with them.üòéüëç

Absolutely wonderful experience! We did it as a family of 4 with two children aged 9 and almost 13 and they both loved it! We didn"t expect it to be so spectacular as it was advertised as a family canyoning trip but it was very safe and we all absolutely loved it. Arnau was a great guide who really took care of us. A bonus were the pictures they took and sent trough afterwards. An extra plus was 'thanks to' the corona regulations, it was just us 4 and the guide which made it extra special. Thanks again for the best day of our holiday!
Via Ferrat was great! Well organised and the guide was a very helpful patient and encouraging. This was my first time and I really recommend it to everyone.

name: SB Canyoning
description: At Aventura Girona we are backed by more than 10 years of experience in adventure activities applied to reinforcing the bond between co-workers, with the aim of seeking escape, fun and sociability away from the everyday environment.

reviews.text: We had a superb tour in the Boixols canyon today with Alex. The weather was perfect, the canyon was marvellous and Alex is just a fantastic guide. His English was perfect, he showed a lot of patience in explaining everything to our kids and the whole trip went supersmooth and 100% safe. SB canyoning is highly recommended, we will definitely come back!!

Can only recommend to go with Bernat to visit some of the Canyons he knows. He is a very good guide, gives a lot of confidence and if you fear something he always has an alternative route! We had 2 amazing days with him, and as soon as we are back in the neighborhood we will book another trip with him!
Professional and wel trained guideance
Amazing! Especially thanks to Oscar and √Älex for making everything much easier for me 100% recommended, we will even repeat for sure. Thank you!!

Very good experience! Last Sunday a group of 4 friends went to the Boixols canyoning route and we had a great time. The monitors are very attentive and guide you at all times, we feel very comfortable. 100% recommendable!

name: √Äger parapent
description: We are professionals with a lot of experience, we have taught hundreds of students to fly, we have made thousands of two-seater flights making people of all ages enjoy and feel happy. All the pilots in our team have been flying in the Vall d'√Äger for more than 18 years and we know this valley and its flight conditions perfectly, and even though we are of diverse origins, we consider this valley as our home.

reviews.text: Nice site, and very beautiful
Very professional and kind.

100% recommended.
All very nice and pleasant. We really liked the experience, it's worth it.

My partner paraglided this morning and was delighted with the experience! He didn‚Äôt have them all and when they landed he was left wanting more!

Thank you all for everything, and especially to your Genius monitor, you made him feel calm and safe at all times!

For its part,
James.

Excellent experience!!! An exquisite treatment by Cristina and Antonio, the pilot.
We will certainly deliver.

address: Pla dels Vinyets s/n, 25794 Organy√†, Lleida
name: Organy√† Xperience
description: Come paragliding and discover the magnificent views of the Alt Urgell, take off from the ground to discover a lot of new and indescribable sensations and enjoy the landscape from a bird's eye view. Discover another way of seeing the world with our technical team, which has extensive experience in the field of teaching and free flight.

reviews.text: Jordi Medina, a professional
Jordi is a vocational paragliding instructor. He likes to teach and he does it transmitting confidence and rigor. Excellent.
The instructors are very professional and friendly. 100% recommended.

It has been a phenomenal experience, recommended activity, great.
The professional and delivered team.
Thank you !!!
Amazing!!! A great and unparalleled experience !! All in good time the structure as the organizer! RECOMMENDABLE

name: Tandem Team: Paragliding school
description: TandemTeam is a professional paragliding school located in Castej√≥n de sos. In the heart of the Pyrenees, in the Benasque Valley. In our school you can find all the official courses for you to become an autonomous pilot with guarantees. In addition, we are an Active Tourism company, so we offer paragliding flights for all people who want to have the experience of flying in a unique place such as the Pyrenees.

reviews.text: Fantastic experience. Worth every cent. Myself and our three children 16, 14 and 12 did tandem jumps. Nico and Alberto were two of the pilots. Very relaxed and professional pilots. Would recommend them anytime!

It has been a very good experience.
All the staff of Tandem Team extraordinary, very professional.
Thanks, we will repeat

An unforgettable experience!!
Eli's attention in the Tandem Team office was exceptional, and we already knew that we had not been in the wrong place. Sympathy and absolute professionalism.

And the pilots made us have a very special experience that will remain
in our memory. Great professionals who took care of all the details, inspiring a lot of confidence.
We visited some other center before flying, and I honestly think they are the best in Castej√≥n de Sos.
With them you will not be wrong! üëèüèº

Thanks to all the team for making our flight a great experience üëçüèº

We will be back for other activities !!!

I did the Paragliding Progression course for 5 days in August. We made a total of 10 flights, and that taking into account that a day and a half we dedicated to the theory for bad weather.
We have flown in calm conditions and also in more active conditions at midday, and I have felt very monitored and guided by the station at all times. The instructor flew near us and indicated exercises to practice.
The equipment they loaned me was in excellent condition.
It has made me short and I will surely do more courses with them.
This has only started!

100% recommendable.
Very good treatment from the girl in the office, as well as from the boys who do the jumps. I advise calling to reserve the day and time. They send you the reservation confirmation and advice on what clothes and shoes to wear. With the Covid issue, jumping with a mask is mandatory. It is not inconvenient and does not disturb the jump.
The meeting point is at the Castej√≥n de Sos office, and from there they take you by van to the jump point.
It takes about 45 minutes to get to the highest point, with spectacular views while ascending, although it is a bumpy ride due to the bumping of the poor condition of the road. The problem is the track, which is shameful that it is not fixed and in good condition. I urge the Government of Aragon, the City Council, or whoever is concerned, ... to get down to work, since Castej√≥n de Sos is one of the main paragliding spots in Europe, and it gives a very bad image how is the way up with the traffic that there is.
The companions of those who jump are given directions to easily walk along a path in which you reach the point where they land in 10 minutes, being able to take photos and watch how they descend. You can also go by car.
In our case, I must say that my mother-in-law finally fulfilled her dream at the age of 72, and her tandem flight from El Gallinero was spectacular. They treated her very well, and both takeoff and landing were perfect. She is looking forward to coming back. üòä
